org.netbeans.core.startup

Class Splash

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.netbeans.core.startup.Splash
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    Stamps.Updater

    public final class Splash
extends Object
implements Stamps.Updater
    A class that encapsulates all the splash screen things.
